includedAssets.title: The Smile
includedAssets.synopsis: A former asset comes to the CIA with information, but will only speak to Carrie. Season two of the critically acclaimed drama.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A former asset comes to the CIA with information, but will only speak to Carrie. Season two of the critically acclaimed drama.

includedAssets.title: Beirut is Back
includedAssets.synopsis: Carrie and Saul follow up questionable intelligence in Lebanon as Brody grows closer to the vice president.

includedAssets.synopsis: Carrie doesn't get the welcome home she expected, while Brody tries to balance his conflicting responsibilities.

includedAssets.synopsis: Carrie struggles with being kept out of the loop. Brody finds himself a prisoner once again.

includedAssets.synopsis: Saul interviews the imprisoned Aileen to find out the identity of the man who met with Roya. Dana opens up about the accident.

includedAssets.title: Two Hats
includedAssets.synopsis: Brody battles to keep his family safe and finally break free of al-Qaeda and the CIA. Saul covertly investigates Quinn's background.

includedAssets.title: Season 2
includedAssets.synopsis: Brody struggles to pick a side, while Carrie and the CIA work to use him to capture Abu Nazir. Second season of the critically acclaimed drama starring Claire Danes, Damian Lewis, Mandy Patinkin and David Harewood.

includedIn.title: Homeland
includedIn.shortSynopsis: Counter-terrorist expert Carrie Mathison struggles to balance her brilliance with the challenges of bipolar disorder as she fights to protect the US.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: Counter-terrorist expert Carrie Mathison struggles to balance her instinctual brilliance with the challenges of bipolar disorder as she fights to protect the US from attack.
